itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with baseball legend and still Non-Hall-Of-Famer Pete Rose to discuss the Houston Astros cheating scandal, how cheesy-ass Alex Rodriguez beat the steroid scandal, the greed of the modern day baseball player, how the Hall Of Fame is letting in mediocre players, and his relationship with OJ Simpson.
